column1: Little Goat Diner////I've heard so many things about this place that I had to go try it out! Definitely make a reservation here cuz it can get pretty crowded. The vibe of the restaurant is very 1960s - vinyl booths
column4: vibrant images on the walls. The menu is pretty typical diner food with some interesting ethnic twists that I wasn't sure how to feel about. I ordered their popular bullseye French toast
column5: and my friends ordered the chili and the American burger
column6: as well as the One Twisted Sundae. Breakfast is available all day which is amazing! The French toast was a very interesting blend of savory and sweet and it was really filling! The sundae was great and I heard that the burger was very solid. Overall loved the vibe of the restaurant and the food
